name: DETIC asbl / vzw
goal:
DETIC represents three main sectors, Cosmetics, Detergents & maintenance products and Adhesives & Sealants, as well as Biocial products and Aerosol technology in Belgium and Luxemburg.
DETIC provides supports to her members for Technical-Regulatory Affairs and Communication & Sustainability.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: Chemicals legislation REFIT (Reach, CLP), Detergents Regulation (648/2004) REFIT, Aerosol Dispensors Directive 75/324/CEE) Evaluation, Packaging & Packaging Waste Directive (94/62/EC), Waste Framework Directive (2008/98/EC) and Circular Economy Package, Cosmetic Products Regulation and other related regulation, such as Unfair Commercial Practices Directive
